abstract: If someone has duplicated your Facebook account, the company has a series of steps to take to report it, including legal ones.
snippet: If someone has duplicated your Facebook account, the company has a series of steps to take to report it, including legal ones.
lead_paragraph: Q. Someone seems to have duplicated my Facebook account and is sending out requests to my friends pretending to be me. I can still get into my page and have warned my friends, but how do I alert Facebook to this scammer?
